channel.title: [Galkon's 474]Prayer/Magic Buttons
channel.description:
When you click protect from melee, it'll show protect from range, and so on. On the magic book, if you click high alch, it'll select the spell next to it.
How can I get the buttons positioned correctly?
EDIT: Here's a GIF:
